"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.container1","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container1","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid2","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid2 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid2$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid2$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Vendor Development"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Jewellery Division :"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Titan is one of the leading lifestyle companies in India, known for its exquisite jewellery brands such as Tanishq, Zoya & Mia, known for its high-quality, purity & handcrafted jewellery products. Our company is having a strong reputation for manufacturing capabilities, and produces a wide range of jewellery products including Gold, Diamond & Platinum jewellery.

In addition to our own manufacturing, Tanishq also works with external vendor partners and artisans, who use traditional techniques to create intricate, handcrafted pieces. Also, we work with a variety of suppliers and vendor partners to source our raw materials and components used in jewellery products starting from Diamonds, Gemstones till the tools & consumables, Packing, Logistics services etc.,

We work closely with our vendor partners and provide them with the necessary support and resources to improve their operations and capabilities, so that both company and vendor can benefit from a long-term, mutually beneficial relationship. The company also have a strong focus on sustainability and ethical sourcing and encourages the vendor partners to focus on that.

All vendor partners are selected based on the ability to consistently provide high-quality products and services, alignment with Titan values & business goals and their compliance with fair trade, labour and environmental laws. Performing vendors have seen their businesses with us grow substantially over the years.

Or write to:"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text5","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text5","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Mr. Sanjay Ranawade

Chief Manufacturing Officer,

Jewellery Division,

29, Sipcot Industrial Complex,

Hosur – 635 126, India"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid2$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col align-self-center","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.staticImage2","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage2","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$bsnss_division.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}}]}}]}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.container2","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container2","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid3","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid3 col","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.staticImage3","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage3","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$_2222_0.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid3$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg align-self-center","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text1","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text1","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Watches & Wearables Division :"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text6","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text6","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"The Watches & Wearable division sources Watches, Watch appearance parts like Case, Dial, Strap, etc., and specialty Movements for our watch manufacturing operations. We source Raw materials such as Stainless steel, Tool steel, Leaded Brass, Aluminium, Engineering plastic and Tools, Consumables, and Packaging materials for our in-house manufacturing. In addition to the above we source Clock, Wearable & Hearable products. Currently, our vendor’s base is spread over 20+ countries, mainly in Asia and Europe apart from India.

We have a robust Vendor Management System and endeavor to continuously improve in building stronger relationships with our Vendor partners.

We share our plans and goals with key vendor partners and work together on new developments in Products, Materials, and Processes. Our performing Vendor partners have seen their businesses with us grow substantially over the years."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text7","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text7","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"If you are interested in becoming a Titan vendor, e-mail us at vendors@titan.co.in or send your request to the below SAP-Ariba link:"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.actionButton1","widget":"ActionButton","props":{"buttonId":"54.S.VEndor.actionButton1","class":"mx-name-actionButton1","renderType":"link","role":"button","buttonClass":"btn-default","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Click Here"},"args":{}}},"tooltip":{"$type":"TextProperty","value":""},"action":{"$type":"ActionProperty","action":{"type":"openLink","argMap":{},"config":{"schema":"web","address":"https://s3.ariba.com/Sourcing/Main/aw?awh=r&awssk=WxK1vD1XTcU9hvIP&realm=titancompanyltd&dard=1"},"disabledDuringExecution":true},"abortOnServerValidation":true}}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text8","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text8","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Or write to:"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text9","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text9","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"General Manager – Sourcing

Titan Company Limited

Watches & Wearables Division

3, Sipcot Industrial Complex,

Hosur - 635 126, India

"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.container3","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container3","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid4","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid4 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid4$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid4$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text10","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text10","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Eyecare Division :"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h4"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text11","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text11","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"The Titan Eyecare Division is in the business of providing our customers the best in Eye care through our multiple chain stores called Titan Eye+. In this Endeavour, we are always looking for Suppliers of Optical Frames and Sunglasses as well as Eyecare packaging and accessories and Lens manufacturers who produce goods of very high quality and who have the experience to manufacture products as per the CE standards. Being from such a reputed company/brand, the most important aspect we look for in products from such suppliers is high quality and prompt delivery at the right prices.

Also please note that we would like to do business with manufacturers only and we will not do business with trading companies.

If you are interested in vendor partnership with Titan Company Limited, e-mail us at jyothees@titan.co.in 


"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text12","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text12","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Mr. Jyothee S. Swaroop Manager of Sourcing Eyecare

Titan Company Limited

Integrity, #193, Veerasandra,

Electronic City PO,

Off Hosur Main Road,

Bangalore – 560100, India

"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h5"}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.text13","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text13","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Text"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.layoutGrid4$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"54.S.VEndor.staticImage4","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage4","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$Titan_eyeplus_0.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"listenTargets":[]
